long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a convenient tool for users of navit.ai, as it integrates navit.ai into any website in a sidebar.

Usage:
- Select text on a webpage, then click any command in the popup menu. Each command calls a specific bot on navit.ai to perform a task or answer a question. The response from the bot will be shown in the sidebar.
- Click the extension icon to open the sidebar, then choose any bot to chat with.

About the website navit.ai:
navit.ai is your one-stop AI bot marketplace. You can build your own bot, or choose from over 100 specialized bots. Simply ask any bot directly or let the bot "navit" choose the best one to solve your problem.

History:
- v0.3.x: [New Feature] Show a popup menu when selecting text on a webpage. Each command in the menu calls a bot to perform a task in the sidebar.
- v0.2.x: Integrated navit.ai into any website in a sidebar.
- v0.1.x: Integrated navit.ai into the popup page of this extension.
